description: Try our easy to follow Philadelphia Cream Cheese & Cherry Ripe Chocolate Cups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Philadelphia Cream Cheese & Cherry Ripe Chocolate Cups
name: Philadelphia Cream Cheese & Cherry Ripe Chocolate Cups Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slide a thin spatula around cream cheese cups and pop out of tin. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
